location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinston, Civil Accounts, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has left a large hole in the fabric of the folio. This has obscured some of the text in the body of the letter making it difficult to read. The hole also obscures some of the address, however it is still possible to identify the intended recipient.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of circulars and reports received.
